title: Sir Banion and the Quest of the Black Plague
description: As word of a mysterious plague reaches the shores of Ireland, Banion and his friends prepare to step into their roles as knights of the southern kingdom. As the day of the trials comes upon them, they are thrust head first into madness as they face the risen dead. Ireland faces extinction unless the young knights can spread the word of the plague throughout the country as they race north to reach the king and join the fight to reclaim Ireland's shores.
author: T.H. Strickland
